```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
cakes <- read_csv("raw_data/cake-ingredients-1961.csv")
codes <- read_csv("raw_data/cake_ingredient_code.csv")
```

```{r}
clean_cake <-
  cakes %>%
  pivot_longer(-Cake,
    names_to = "code", 
    values_to = "amount",
    )

clean_cake
```

```{r}
 cleaned_cakes <- clean_names(clean_cake)
```



```{r}
cake_join <- 
  left_join(cleaned_cakes, codes) %>%
  drop_na(amount)

cake_join
```

```{r}
cake_join
```



```{r}
cake <- select(cake_join, -code)
cake
```
